MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH10 postcode area of Edinburgh. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of on site delays and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:52pm on Monday, 26th April 2021.
